input_email_body:
Subject: Required Assistance for Security Issues

A healthcare provider has encountered unauthorized access attempts on medical data You can reach me at david.kim@corp.kr.. Initial actions taken involved updating firewall settings and reviewing user access logs. The root cause is believed to be due to outdated security protocols. My name is John Doe.
